definition: A temporary shelter or accommodation typically used in emergency situations or times of crisis. It serves as a place of refuge for individuals or groups who are in immediate need of housing due to unforeseen circumstances or displacement.

examples.german: Die Notunterkunft bietet Schutz vor dem Unwetter.
examples.english: The emergency shelter provides protection from the storm.

examples.german: Die Flüchtlinge wurden in Notunterkünften untergebracht.
examples.english: The refugees were accommodated in emergency shelters.

examples.german: Die Stadt hat Notunterkünfte für Obdachlose eingerichtet.
examples.english: The city has set up emergency shelters for the homeless.

examples.german: Die Notunterkunft war überfüllt und konnte keine weiteren Personen aufnehmen.
examples.english: The emergency shelter was overcrowded and could not accommodate any more people.

examples.german: Die Notunterkünfte werden von Hilfsorganisationen betrieben.
examples.english: The emergency shelters are operated by aid organizations.
